name: Boon, Inc
description: Boon is the world’s most agile referral hiring platform that scales across your entire community to deliver better hires, faster.
one_liner: Boon is the world’s most agile referral hiring platform that scales across your entire community to deliver better hires, faster.
industry: Crowdsourcing, SaaS, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Work, Network Effects, B2B Marketplaces, HR Tech

name: Clockster Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of staff management platform designed to offer a time and attendance management system for employees. The company's platform offers a cloud-based system in the form of a biometric-based clock-in device to focus on shift management, attendance, salary calculations, communications, and tasks, enabling food and beverage and retail industry enterprises to manage attendance and automate payroll, scheduling, business routines and save time.
one_liner: Developer of staff management platform designed to offer a time and attendance management system for employees. The company's platform offers a cloud-based system in the form of a biometric-based clock-in device to focus on shift management, attendance, salary calculations, communications, and tasks, enabling food and beverage and retail industry enterprises to manage attendance and automate payroll, scheduling, business routines and save time.

name: Croissant, Inc.
description: Developer of workspace search app designed to find co-working spaces. The company's application helps look for spaces for working from a mix of co-working spots, cafes, startup offices, hotels, and restaurants, enabling clients to find workspaces on the go.
one_liner: Developer of workspace search app designed to find co-working spaces. The company's application helps look for spaces for working from a mix of co-working spots, cafes, startup offices, hotels, and restaurants, enabling clients to find workspaces on the go.

name: Spacious Ltd
description: Operator of an online marketplace created to match companies requiring flexible office space with landlords and commercial space providers. The company's marketplace helps businesses rent, manage and share office space, enabling clients to search, curate, and rent office spaces in London, helping them find the right balance of office and remote working, so their teams can thrive.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace created to match companies requiring flexible office space with landlords and commercial space providers. The company's marketplace helps businesses rent, manage and share office space, enabling clients to search, curate, and rent office spaces in London, helping them find the right balance of office and remote working, so their teams can thrive.

name: Knotable, Inc.
description: Developer of a note-taking application intended to help businesses to streamline their work in an organized way. The company's application combines smooth note-taking features, a visual organization system and unlimited file storage to offer email, sticky notes and a file cabinet in one package, enabling users to eliminate the daily stand-up meetings and make things smooth and efficient.
one_liner: Developer of a note-taking application intended to help businesses to streamline their work in an organized way. The company's application combines smooth note-taking features, a visual organization system and unlimited file storage to offer email, sticky notes and a file cabinet in one package, enabling users to eliminate the daily stand-up meetings and make things smooth and efficient.

name: Outsite, Inc.
description: Provider of co-working and co-living spaces intended to offer locations to explore and work remotely. The company's spaces are spread across various locations with Wi-Fi and open workspace, enabling entrepreneurs, developers, designers, and artists to be productive while having fun and connecting with a community of inspiring people.
one_liner: Provider of co-working and co-living spaces intended to offer locations to explore and work remotely. The company's spaces are spread across various locations with Wi-Fi and open workspace, enabling entrepreneurs, developers, designers, and artists to be productive while having fun and connecting with a community of inspiring people.

name: K.K. Spacee
description: Provider of renting services intended to allow idle spaces to be rented out to general users as a meeting room. The company's platform offers a wide variety of rooms, from cheap to high-grade, such as private rental conference rooms, training, study sessions, seminar venues, rental kitchens, photography studios, and party rental rooms, enabling clients to book open meeting rooms in nearby offices.
one_liner: Provider of renting services intended to allow idle spaces to be rented out to general users as a meeting room. The company's platform offers a wide variety of rooms, from cheap to high-grade, such as private rental conference rooms, training, study sessions, seminar venues, rental kitchens, photography studios, and party rental rooms, enabling clients to book open meeting rooms in nearby offices.

name: PODIO.XYZ, Inc.
description: Developer of a podcast platform designed to help organizations improve internal communications and upskill their employees. The company's platform creates internal company podcasts regarding weekly team recaps, strategy updates, new hire welcomes, and announcements, enabling employees and business leaders to communicate messages conveniently.
one_liner: Developer of a podcast platform designed to help organizations improve internal communications and upskill their employees. The company's platform creates internal company podcasts regarding weekly team recaps, strategy updates, new hire welcomes, and announcements, enabling employees and business leaders to communicate messages conveniently.

name: Takenos Inc.
description: Operator of a blockchain-based payment platform designed to offer cross-border workers to access their earnings instantly in cash or crypto. The company offers an international digital wallet to receive income from anywhere in the world and dispose of it as per preference, enabling users to receive payment from the company or platform they are working at.
one_liner: Operator of a blockchain-based payment platform designed to offer cross-border workers to access their earnings instantly in cash or crypto. The company offers an international digital wallet to receive income from anywhere in the world and dispose of it as per preference, enabling users to receive payment from the company or platform they are working at.

name: Unito Inc.
description: Developer of a project management platform designed to integrate disparate SaaS applications and to synchronize projects, tasks, and conversations between different applications. The company's platform helps to work seamlessly without switching applications all the time, choose what to sync between tools, and copy a few tasks or entire projects from multiple tools, enabling businesses to be productive and have enhanced team collaboration.
one_liner: Developer of a project management platform designed to integrate disparate SaaS applications and to synchronize projects, tasks, and conversations between different applications. The company's platform helps to work seamlessly without switching applications all the time, choose what to sync between tools, and copy a few tasks or entire projects from multiple tools, enabling businesses to be productive and have enhanced team collaboration.

name: PT Urban Solusi Digital
description: Operator of an online workspace search platform intended to find and rent a room according to users' needs. The company's platform allows users to book meeting rooms, event spaces, coworking spaces, office rooms, and virtual offices among others, enabling users to use and benefit from the spaces that meet their requirements.
one_liner: Operator of an online workspace search platform intended to find and rent a room according to users' needs. The company's platform allows users to book meeting rooms, event spaces, coworking spaces, office rooms, and virtual offices among others, enabling users to use and benefit from the spaces that meet their requirements.
